item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: Spring 2025 School of Engineering Midterm Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Friday, February 28, 2025 - Spring 2025 School of Engineering (SoE) Midterm course evaluations are now open. Your feedback is very important to the Institute and the school, so please complete the SoE midterm evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Monday, March 10, 2025.

item.title: United Way Cheesecake Fundraiser - Orders due by March 13th
item.description: Indulge your sweet tooth and donate to charity at the same time! New Skete Kitchen cheesecake’s for sale. Orders & payment Due by midday March 13th. Checks should be made out to RPI. Pick-up on April 16th. Follow link to order.

item.title: Explore Rensselaer’s Online Graduate Certificate Programs | March 20
item.description: Date: Thursday, March 20, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for a 30-minute information session showcasing Rensselaer’s full range of online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Each certificate consists of three courses, focuses on developing targeted skill sets, and can be completed in as little as seven months. Please complete the form to RSVP.

item.title: RPI Welcomes 28 New Employees in January 2025
item.description: Please join us in welcoming 28 new employees who started at RPI in January! Congratulations to all on their new roles — we’re excited to see the positive impact they will make on our community!

item.title: Explore Whiteboarding Tools: Webex & Box Canvas | March 18
item.description:
Tuesday, March 18, 2025 1:00 PM2:00 PM - Join this in-person workshop to learn about two DotCIO-supported whiteboarding tools: Webex’s whiteboard feature and Box Canvas. Get an overview of both tools and see how they can enhance your classroom or meetings. Register here by 3/14—space is limited!
